specification: Welcome to "Sky Gardens," where luxury living harmoniously blends with the enchantment of city vistas and unforgettable sunsets. This three-bedroom apartment transcends the realm of mere residence; it's an everyday experience that will leave you in awe.,Imagine waking up to stunning panoramic city views that stretch as far as the eye can see. "Sky Gardens" bestows upon you the privilege of embracing the dynamic beauty of the city skyline right from the comfort of your own home.,Prime Location,Nestled in the heart of Glen Waverley, "Sky Gardens" offers seamless access to premium retail and entertainment options, solidifying its status as a coveted landmark address. Plus, it's conveniently within walking distance to train and bus stops, enhancing your mobility.,Educational Excellence,"Sky Gardens" resides within the highly sought-after Glen Waverley Secondary School Zone (STSA) and Glen Waverley Primary School Zone, ensuring your family enjoys access to top-tier education., Modern Living with World-Class Amenities,Beyond its educational advantages, "Sky Gardens" boasts a wealth of amenities, including a sprawling 4,000sqm garden area, an indoor swimming pool, a fully-equipped gym, meticulously landscaped communal spaces, and more. Here, luxury seamlessly melds with grandeur, crafting an extraordinary living experience.,Your Dream Home Awaits,This opulent three-bedroom apartment showcases:,• Premium Fixtures and Fittings,• Sumptuous Timber Flooring,• High-End Miele Appliances,• Expansive Living Areas,• Luxurious Master Bedroom with Ensuite,• Sun-Drenched Interiors with Abundant Natural Light,• Energy-Efficient Double-Glazed Windows,• Secure Dedicated Car Space,• Thoughtful and Convenient Storage Solutions,• Split System Unit for Personalized Comfort,• Convenient European Laundry Facilities,"Sky Gardens" is more than just a home; it's a lifestyle where every detail has been meticulously crafted to offer you the best in contemporary living.,To embark on this unparalleled living experience, please contact Ivan U for a private inspection!,
